name: Version Story
headline: GitHub meets Figma for documents
description:
Version Story organizes a document's history and generates comparisons in a way that is simple and intuitive. It is built to fit seamlessly into your workflow.

Lawyers, publishers, content creators, academic researchers, documentation-writers, and ops teams use Version Story to compare, track, and merge documents with ease.

Version Story supports comparisons and merging of multiple Word (.doc, .docx), Google Docs, and PDF files.

raw_markdown='[![](https://versionstory.com/images/version-story-logo--dark-background.svg) Version Story ](https://versionstory.com/<index.html>)
Why Version Story?
# We'll help you
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/cursor-click.svg) Make redlining easy Our visual approach to redlining makes it easy. ](https://versionstory.com/<solutions/easy.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/shield-check.svg) Create beautiful redlines Our redlines look the way redlines are supposed to. ](https://versionstory.com/<solutions/precise.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/cog.svg) Stay organized Group your documents to organize them by matter. ](https://versionstory.com/<solutions/organized.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/clock.svg) Save time Our redline engine is blazing fast and we make _you_ faster. ](https://versionstory.com/<solutions/fast.html>)
# What you can do
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/document-duplicate.svg) Standard redlines You can create simple one-to-one comparisons. ](https://versionstory.com/<uses/simple-comparisons.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/document-add.svg) Bulk redlines Run unlimited one-to-many redlines in seconds. ](https://versionstory.com/<uses/bulk-comparisons.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/chevron-double-right.svg) Merge documents Merge multiple docs into a single track-changes draft. ](https://versionstory.com/<uses/merge.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/document-search.svg) View revision history See changes across multiple versions in one redline. ](https://versionstory.com/<uses/blame.html>)
# We're enterprise ready
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/lock-closed.svg) Enterprise Security We keep your client data safe with world-class security measures. ](https://versionstory.com/<enterprise/security.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/database.svg) DMS Integrations Version Story integrates with NetDocs, iManage, and Sharepoint. ](https://versionstory.com/<enterprise/dms-integrations.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/key.svg) IT Controls We give you direct control over user access, data retention, AI, and more. ](https://versionstory.com/<enterprise/controls.html>)
Resources
# Learn
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/clipboard-check.svg) Getting started guide Learn how to set up Version Story and run your first comparison. ](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/help?article=Add%20Documents>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/document-add.svg) How to bulk redline This guide will walk you through running a one-to-many bulk redline. ](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/help?article=Bulk%20Comparisons>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/chevron-double-right.svg) How to merge documents Instructions on merging multiple documents into a consolidated draft. ](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/help?article=Merging%20Documents>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/academic-cap.svg) See all our guides Version Story has a range of powerful capabilities. We have a guide for each. ](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/help>)
# Talk to a person
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/question-mark-circle.svg) Talk to support Describe what you need help with. Our support team is standing by. ](https://versionstory.com/<resources/contact-support.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/calendar.svg) Contact sales Schedule a demo to speak with sales to learn more and arrange a pilot. ](https://versionstory.com/<resources/demo.html>)
Company
# Team
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/user-group.svg) About Us We are on a mission to build great software for lawyers. ](https://versionstory.com/<company/about-us.html>) [![](https://versionstory.com/images/user-add.svg) Careers Help Version Story shape the future of legal services. ](https://versionstory.com/<company/careers.html>)
# News
[![](https://versionstory.com/images/globe-alt.svg) News and Blog The latest news and ideas from Version Story. ](https://versionstory.com/<company/news.html>)

[Contact sales](https://versionstory.com/<resources/demo.html>) [Login](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/login>) [Sign up](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/register>)
# Redlines, Reimagined.
Version Story helps you stay organized, save time, and ensure accuracy.
[**Try it for free**](https://versionstory.com/<https:/app.versionstory.com/register>)
## Version Story is integral to legal workflows
![](https://versionstory.com/images/oliver_neasham_testimonial_headshot.png)
### Oliver Neasham
Mishcon de Reya
"Visualizing how my documents evolve over multiple rounds of negotiation and drafting is game-changing to the way I work."
![](https://versionstory.com/images/guylaine_photo.jpeg)
### GuyLaine Charles
Charles Law PLLC
“Version Story is the best redlining software I have used. It has proven invaluable as my practice and law firm have rapidly grown.”
![](https://versionstory.com/images/mitch_khurin_testimonial_headshot.png)
### Mitch Khurin
Hamilton Zanze
"Version Story allows me to compare dozens of documents all at once. It saves me hours of work and headache each time I use it."
## Version Story handles any comparison situation
Compare
# Compare two documents
Version Story makes it easy to create simple, one-to-one redlines.
[Learn More](https://versionstory.com/<uses/simple-comparisons.html>)
Compare
# Bulk Comparisons
Version Story makes it easy to run bulk redlines — a one-to-many redline.
[Learn More](https://versionstory.com/<uses/bulk-comparisons.html>)
Compare
# Merge Documents
You can easily merge multiple documents into a single track-changes draft.
[Learn More](https://versionstory.com/<uses/merge.html>)
## Version Story's customers include 
##  law firms & in-house counsel
![](https://versionstory.com/images/Yellow-Underline-Vector.png)
![Arise Health logo](https://versionstory.com/images/Barings---Client---Logo.png)
![The Paak logo](https://versionstory.com/images/M---clients---logo.png)
![OE logo](https://versionstory.com/images/client-logo.png)
![2020INC logo](https://versionstory.com/images/client-export-4.png)
![Ephicient logo](https://versionstory.com/images/client-export-5.png)
![Ephicient logo](https://versionstory.com/images/client-export-6.png)
## How We Ensure Accuracy
Our redlines provide **better table comparisons**. Your changes will appear in the correct row and column. We will preserve the formatting of your table, including the appropriate widths and heights.
![](https://versionstory.com/images/Table-Redlines-on-standard-processor.png)
![](https://versionstory.com/images/Table-redlines-with-VS.png)
We show changes in clause references and tables of contents while **preserving linking**. You can see a change in a section reference and click on it to navigate to an inserted or deleted section.
![](https://versionstory.com/images/white-Table-of-contents-graphic.png)

Legal
[Terms of Use](https://versionstory.com/<legal/terms-of-use.html>) [Privacy Policy](https://versionstory.com/<legal/privacy-policy.html>)
Version Story provides self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Communications between you and Version Story are protected by our Privacy Policy, but not by the attorney-client privilege or as work product. We cannot provide any kind of advice, explanation, opinion, or recommendation about possible legal rights, remedies, defenses, options, selection of forms, or strategies. Your access to our website is subject to our Terms of Use.

generated_description:
**Version Story: A Seamless Document Comparison Tool**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Version Story is changing how we approach document management—think of it as GitHub meets Figma for documents. Based in New York and consisting of a focused two-person team, their mission is to simplify the workflow for professionals who need to compare, track, and merge documents efficiently.

**Why Version Story?**

The platform stands out for its intuitive design and ease of use. Whether you're a lawyer, a publisher, or a documentation writer, Version Story allows you to quickly compare Word, Google Docs, and PDF files, ensuring that you can spot changes with minimal hassle. With features like bulk redlining and document merging, it saves users valuable time, transforming tedious document revisions into a smoother process.

**Key Features**:

1. **Visual Redlining**: Version Story takes the pain out of redlining by providing a clear visual approach to highlighting changes, making comparison easy and satisfying.
   
2. **Bulk Comparisons**: You can run one-to-many redlines, allowing for quick assessments of multiple documents simultaneously.
   
3. **Document Merging**: Merge various documents into a single track-changes draft seamlessly.
   
4. **Revision History Tracking**: This feature allows users to trace document evolution, making it easier to see what has changed over time.

**Enterprise-Ready**: 

Version Story boasts robust security measures, including integrations with document management systems like NetDocs and iManage, ensuring that sensitive information avoids unnecessary risks. Plus, users gain control over access and data retention, which is critical in today's data-driven landscape.

**Who Uses Version Story?** 

The product attracts a wide range of professionals such as lawyers, academic researchers, and operations teams—all looking to enhance their document workflow efficiency. Users report significant time savings, with one, Mitch Khurin from Hamilton Zanze, stating it saves him "hours of work and headache" every time he uses it.

### In Summary:

Version Story isn’t just another SaaS tool—it’s designed specifically for those who deal with heavy document usage, particularly in the legal and academic sectors. With its straightforward functionality and emphasis on visual clarity, Version Story makes you wonder how you ever managed without it.

**Visit [Version Story](https://versionstory.com/)** to learn more and try it for yourself.
